description:
Rumors are circulating that a weapons dealer will be using Tony, a Humaritt, to steal one of the exhibits at a weapons fair. Najica and Lila are sent to apprehend her, preferably before she steals the weapon. 
Unfortunately, they have no idea what Tony looks like or what weapon she`s after, so the two secret agents must wait for Tony to make her move. And when she does, will Najica and Lila be fast enough to stop Tony before any innocent bystanders get hurt?

titles.title: Ein Himmel voller Begierde entzündet Kämpfe voller Feuer
Le ciel du désir empreint d`une flamme tournoyante
The Sky of the Desire Appears with the Flame by the Battle
欲望の空は戦い渦巻く炎と共に
